parse.title: Undead giant (Battle of Forinthry)

The undead giants are monsters fought during the Zemouregal & Vorkath battle in the siege phase, which is only present in story and normal mode.

Each of them guards a place of power alongside an assortment of four undead creatures. If the giant takes damage by any means, this send an "alert" that automatically aggros the other guards in a ~25-tile range of the giant's position when it took damage.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 27 November 2023 (Update):
    • Fixed an issue preventing the Salve Amulet from working on the horde phase minibosses during the Battle of Forinthry boss fight.
  • update 20 November 2023 (Update):
    • Added to game.
